value: This technique simplifies osteotomies for extra-articular or minimally displaced articular distal radius malunion, restoring wrist parameters and achieving good union rates. It uses a tricortical iliac bone graft for structural support.
comment: The text details a surgical technique for malunion correction that results in restored wrist parameters and good union rates.
